thread.title_full: Wife jumps into Odisha man’s pyre | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Wife jumps into Odisha man’s pyre | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 20, 2015, 02.14 am Representational image. BHUBANESWAR: In a heartbreaking incident, a woman at Khandapada in Odisha’s Nayagarh district, unable to bear the shock of her husband’s death, attempted to commit suicide by jumping into the funeral pyre of her husband on Sunday. Lipina Senapati, the woman who had got married eight months ago with Rabindra Senapati of Khandapara, was rescued in critical conditions and admitted to Nayagarh district headquarters hospital with severe burn injuries. Lipina’s husband Rabindra Senapati, who used to work in Hyderabad, had died in a road accident at Eluru in Andhra Pradesh on Friday. His body was brought to Khandapara on Sunday. While Rabindra’s body was being cremated, Lipina jumped into the pyre. nation Odisha Suicide Lipina Senapati Also Read Kargil Vijay Diwas: 15 years on, India remembers its martyrs Suicide: Helplines see rise in distressed calls in Hyderabad Karnataka: Transformer banks in every taluk Amarinder Singh serves legal notice to Subramanian Swamy
